description: Coefficients of polynomials of the characteristic polynomials of two matrix systems subtracted: M(n)=Table[Table[If[m == k == 1, n, If[m == k, (-1)^n, 0]], {m, 1, n}], {k, 1, n}];M1(n)=Table[Table[ If[m == k + 1, -1, If[k == n && m == 1, n, If[m == k == n, -n, 0]]], {m, 1, n}], {k, 1, n}]
